result.arabic_text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
result.translation: 78.Ama munaafiqhiin diggah Yalli usun sinni nafsit qcllisaanam kee usun sittin fanal aban garay yaaxigeh, diggah Yalli qellitti ittam inkih yaaxigi kinnim mayaaxigaanaa?
